Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Control
        • Button
  • public abstract class Button
extends Control
    A button is an abstract and special type of control that has an onClick method. It represents controls in the world that can be clicked and should react to that click.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Leonard Bienbeck
